attributes.action: award Joanna Lumley the title of Dame
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna deserves recognition not just for the work she has done for the Gurkhas but also for all the other charities she works for and for being a very fine actress for many years.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
